docs.lead_paragraph: Two widely used. mild tranquilizers may cause serious birth defects if the drugs are taken during the first six weeks of pregnancy; according to the findings of an extensive study published yesterday.

headline.main: A STUDY CAUTIONS ON TRANQUILIZERS; 2 Widely Used Drugs Linked to Birth Defects if Taken Early in a Pregnancy Other Drugs Cited 4 Groups Studied

docs.snippet: Two widely used. mild tranquilizers may cause serious birth defects if the drugs are taken during the first six weeks of pregnancy; according to the findings of an extensive study published yesterday.
